item.title: Using Pageant with VS Code Remote Development
item.description: This article documents using Pageant to manage SSH keys for VS Code Remote. Assumptions VS Code and the VS Code Remote Development extension is installed PuTTY Pageant is being used to manage SSH keys The remote host has a corresponding public key Introduction VS Code Remote Development doesn’t support Pageant out of the box.⁠[1] More specifically, VS Code Remote Development uses the Windows 10 native OpenSSH client and the OpenSSH client doesn’t support Pageant.
